title: Use THCDeviceTensor in FFI
body_html: I am implementing a package with cuda kernel. This used to be easy for Torch using THCDeviceTensor (my Torch code can be found here). Is it possible to include "THCDeviceTensor.cuh" and "THCDeviceTensorUtils.cuh" for a ffi package?

body: I am implementing a package with cuda kernel. This used to be easy for Torch using `THCDeviceTensor` (my Torch code can be found [here](https://github.com/zhanghang1989/Deep-Encoding)). Is it possible to include "THCDeviceTensor.cuh" and "THCDeviceTensorUtils.cuh" for a [ffi package](https://github.com/pytorch/extension-ffi)?
